item.title: Version 6.0.0
item.description:
Focusmo 6.0.0

Whatâ€™s New

  • Timer Modes: Switch between Timer, Stopwatch, and Pomodoro from the tasks screen footer
  • Quick Access Panel: New look with mode switching and project creation
  • Simplified Tasks Screen: Cleaner interface with quick access panel for adding tasks
  • Streamlined Preferences: Reduced clutter for easier navigation
  • Improved Activity Screen: Better layout for tracking your progress
  • Updated Onboarding: Smoother first-time experience
  • Pomodoro Breaks: Start breaks directly from the tasks screen in pomodoro mode
  • Shortcut Error Feedback: Clear messages for shortcut errors and misconfigurations
  • Timer Mode Shortcut: Use Shift + Tab to switch between timer modes on tasks screen
  • Task Completion Logic: Checkmark button now completes sessions; use the tick in the task list to complete tasks

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed time not being recorded when using complete button or stopwatch
  • Fixed logging toggle in menu
  • Fixed Cmd + Enter not starting new task in quick access view
  • Fixed calendar meeting notifications dismissing automatically
  • Fixed notification effects not showing on completion
  • Fixed toggle timer and pause/play shortcuts not working
  • Fixed timer style change option blinking and preventing change
